title: Grammar Error in QuillBot
name: QuillBot
reason: QuillBot has so much error in their grammar checking. So I would suggest people to use grammarly for better grammar checking

title: ChatGpt can not show recent data
name: ChatGpt
reason: I have faced some issue when I tried to collect data from recent time. As chatgpt can not load data and sometimes it shows a very wrong result.

title: Complexity in Adobe Illustrator
name: Adobe Illustrator
reason: Illustrator is cool. But it comes with a cost and moreover you will need a good pc to run it. But I am not professional people like me just need a handy software. So there are a lot of web software available so I do not use it any more. It saves my memory.

title: Why should I pay when there is software available like photoshop
name: Adobe PhotoShop
reason: There is a lot of free software avalible in the web. So buying photoshop license will not be good decision

title: For light usage in your daily avoid use Word
name: Microsoft Word
reason: For every daisy task we dependent on the word. But for me I am a light user and I do not want to bother with the save button . So I rather choose Google docs

title: Google chrome eat lot of RAM
name: Google Chrome
reason: Google is by far the most popular web browser. But it takes a lot of RAM. If you have a low spec device , it will suck maximum of your ram. You can use other browser like brave.
